name: Fresh Bonless Chicken Breast
Description: Chicken Breast is one of the most tender cuts of a chicken. This cut is skinless and has a supple texture.

name: Fresh Lean Ground Beef
Description: Lean ground beef is a great source of protein to use to make your favorite family meals.

name: Fresh Boneless Chicken Thighs
Description: A Thigh Boneless Is produces by deboning of thigh piece. Chicken thigh meat is brown and has a little more fat than the breast, but also slightly more flavor.

name: Fresh Chicken Drumsticks
Description: Chicken Drumstick â€“ Cut from the lower leg, the Drumstick is one of the meatier cuts of a chicken. The leg bone enhances its flavour.

name: Homemade Sausages
Description: Homemade sausages are made with both wild game and domestic meats.

name: Fresh Medium Ground Beef
Description: A time-tested favourite for burgers, tacos and so much more!

name: Fresh Chicken Legs
Description: The whole leg is the juiciest part of the bird, which makes it perfect for any application from smoking and barbecuing to braising, roasting, and slicing up to add to stir-fries.

name: Fresh Pork Tenderloin
Description: The tenderloin comes from a muscle that runs along the spine. It is not a well-used muscle, so it is very tender.

name: Fresh Chicken Cutlets
Description: Cutlets made from chicken and turkey come from the breast, which is already tender.

name: Fresh Boneless Pork Chops
Description: Pork chops are unprocessed and leaner than other cuts. Chops are commonly served as an individual portion, and can be accompanied with applesauce, vegetables, and other sides.

name: Fresh Whole Grain-Fed Chicken
Description: The chicken with all parts intact, generally including the giblets stuffed in the cavity.

name: Fresh Stewing Beef Cubes
Description: Fresh Stewing Beef Cubes give the dish more meat and a more satisfying taste.

name: Fresh Extra Lean Ground Beef
Description: Extra-lean ground beef has less fat, more protein and fewer calories per serving.

name: Fresh Ground Pork
Description: Ground pork is affordable, fresh, and extremely versatile, soaking up any flavor you add to it.

name: Fresh Ground Beef and Pork Duo
Description: An exquisite mix of tender meats.

name: Fresh Organic Boneless Chicken Breast
Description: Skinless boneless chicken breast has been skinned and deboned.

name: Fresh Bone-in Pork Chops
Description: Rib cut pork chops include a rib bone and a medallion of lean loin meat.

name: Maple Leaf Bacon
Description: Made using all-natural ingredients and free of artificial flavours and preservatives.

name: Fresh Leaf Ground Veal
Description: Veal is meat from calves, normally between six and eight months old, but sometimes far younger.

name: Fresh Boneless Beef Blade Roast
Description: A blade pot roast is cut from the shoulder blade area of a beef carcass.

name: Lactania Milk
Description: The Lactantia Milk and oats beverage is a hybrid milk crafted with traditional dairy milk and oat milk.

name: Nutri Brown Organic Eggs
Description: These organic large brown eggs come from free-range chickens, fed on certified organic foods.

name: Liberte Classique Yogurt
Description: Smooth plain traditional yogourt. No sugar added, and no artificial flavours or colours.

name: Beatrice Sour Cream
Description: Beatrice Sour Cream is a cultured dairy product with a smooth, medium bodied texture and creamy taste profile.

name: Danone Active yogurt
Description: It contains a unique mix of no less than five ferments, including its exclusive Bifidus, all carefully selected by Danone scientists.

name: Kraft Philadelphia Cream Cheese
Description: PHILADELPHIA Soft Cream Cheese has a mild cream cheese flavor and a creamy, soft texture for added spreadability.

name: Liberte Organic Yogurt
Description: A superfood because it is packed with calcium, protein, and active good bacteria which helps keep the gut healthy.

name: Nutri Large White Eggs
Description: Eggs are all-natural and provide one of the highest quality proteins of any food available.

name: Liberte Greek Yogurt
Description: Crafted using traditional Greek methods, the yogourt is strained according to the principles of old-time cheesecloth draining, which gives it an incredibly rich and creamy texture.

name: Beatrice Chocolate Milk 1L
Description: Chocolate Milk Beverage is a good nutritional choice as it is low in fat and is an excellent source of calcium, vitamin D and vitamin A.

name: Lactantia Cream
Description: Help support your Immune health with Lactantia ImmuDefense.

name: Becel Margarine
Description: Becel margarine has 80 percent less saturated fat than butter and is a delicious and simple way to incorporate plant-based oils into your diet.

name: Philadelphia Cream cheese
Description: PHILADELPHIA Soft Cream Cheese has a mild cream cheese flavor and a creamy, soft texture for added spreadability.

name: Astro Balkan Yogurt
Description: Astro Original Balkan yogourt is made with 100 precent all-natural ingredients. Itâ€™s thick and creamy with only 3 ingredients: skim milk, cream and active bacterial cultures.

name: Beatric Cottage Cheese
Description: High content of casein protein while being relatively low in fat.

name: Naturouef Liquid Egg Whites
Description: Naturouef liquid egg whites can be used in place of whole eggs in all your favorite dishes to reduce calories, fat and cholesterol content.

name: Liberte Organic Kefir
Description: Choosing nature with LibertÃ© Organic. Kefir is a complex fermented milk product containing bacteria and yeast, and is recommended by Canadaâ€™s Food Guide for its calcium content.

name: Bananas
Description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

name: Avocados Bag
Description: The fruit is botanically a large berry containing a single large seed.

name: Lemons
Description: Lemon is a type of citrus fruit. The fruit, juice, and peel are used to make medicine.People use lemon for conditions such as the common cold, a disease caused by vitamin C deficiency (scurvy), skin care, morning sickness, and many others.

name: Strawberries
Description: The fruit is widely appreciated for its characteristic aroma, bright red color, juicy texture, and sweetness. It is consumed in large quantities, either fresh or in such prepared foods as jam, juice, pies, ice cream, milkshakes, and chocolates.

name: Raspberries
Description: The raspberry is the edible fruit of a multitude of plant species in the genus Rubus of the rose family, most of which are in the subgenus Idaeobatus.

name: Vine Tomatoes
Description: Tomatoes are a significant source of umami flavor. The tomato is consumed in diverse ways, raw or cooked, in many dishes, sauces, salads, and drinks.

name: Red Seedles Grapes
Description: Portable and convenient to eat, seedless red grapes offer the benefit of an assortment of nutrients in one low-calorie snack.

name: Blackberries
Description: Blackberries are a great source of antioxidants. These include anthocyanins, which are responsible for the rich colors in several red, purple, and blue foods.

name: Golden Ripe Pineapples
Description: Chunks of pineapple are used in desserts such as fruit salad, as well as in some savory dishes, including pizza toppings, or as a grilled ring on a hamburger.

name: Avocados
Description: The fruit is not sweet, but distinctly and subtly flavored, with smooth texture.

name: Limes
Description: Limes have higher contents of sugars and acids than lemons do. Lime juice may be squeezed from fresh limes, or purchased in bottles in both unsweetened and sweetened varieties.

name: Blueberries
Description: Pea-size berries growing on low-level bushes are known as lowbush blueberries. Canada is the leading producer of lowbush blueberries.

name: Oranges
Description: Oranges, whose flavor may vary from sweet to sour, are commonly peeled and eaten fresh or squeezed for juice.

name: Yellow Mangoes
Description: A mango is an edible stone fruit produced by the tropical tree Mangifera indica which is believed to have originated from the region between northwestern Myanmar, Bangladesh, and northeastern India.

name: Red Mangoes
Description: Red Mangoes have dark red blush over a small portion of thier skin.

name: Cantaloupe
Description: Cantaloupe is normally eaten as a fresh fruit, as a salad, or as a dessert with ice cream or custard.

name: Broccoli
Description: Broccoli is an edible green plant in the cabbage family whose large flowering head, stalk and small associated leaves are eaten as a vegetable.

name: Green Onions
Description: Green Onions may be cooked or used raw as a part of salads, salsas or Asian recipes.

name: English Cucumbers
Description: English cucumbers, Cucumis sativus, are actually bred to create a cucumber without some of the more undesirable characteristics that this vegetable has, such as a tough outer skin, large seeds, and a bitter taste.
